snippet: After an overnight flight to London in preparation for their regular-season game against Detroit on Thursday, the jet-lagged Knicks were given the day off by Coach Mike Woodson
abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson gives players day off after overnight flight to London for regular-season game against Detroit Pistons; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: After an overnight flight to London in preparation for their regular-season game against Detroit on Thursday, the jet-lagged Knicks were given the day off by Coach Mike Woodson
